trans-unit.source: After you define the content for an <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRule> object, you must add it to the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument.Rules%2A> collection of an <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument> instance using the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRulesCollection.Add%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 에 대 한 콘텐츠를 정의 하 고 나면는 <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRule> 개체에 추가 해야 합니다는 <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument.Rules%2A> 컬렉션은 <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument> 인스턴스에서 사용 하는 <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRulesCollection.Add%2A> 메서드.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRule> cannot be used for recognition until it has been added to the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument.Rules%2A> collection of an <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument> instance.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRule> 에 추가 된 인식에 사용할 수는 <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument.Rules%2A> 컬렉션은 <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument> 인스턴스.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRulesCollection" /> class.
The array of rule objects to add to the <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRulesCollection" /> object.
Adds the contents of an array of <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRule" /> objects to the <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRulesCollection" /> object.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRule" /> 개체의 배열 내용을 컬렉션의 <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRulesCollection" /> 개체에 추가합니다.

trans-unit.source: Any <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRule" /> object in the <paramref name="rules" /> array is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="rules" /> 배열의 모든 <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRule" /> 개체가 <see langword="null" />인 경우
